Document Structure¶

This section provides utilities to define a document’s basic structure.

class simpletex.document.Document(documentClass='article', size='12pt')[source]¶

A class which manages a LaTeX document.

This class does NOT manage the preamble (imports, newcommand declarations, etc.). The preamble is managed by the simpletex.Preamble class. Upon instantiation, loads sets the input encoding to UTF-8 and declares the document class.
